title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description:
An error message is thrown when trying to use the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter.
The error occurs when a new datasource is created with a dataset containing a datetime column. Then a table is inserted and a filter is created based on the datetime column. Finally, when trying to set the value1 of the filter to new Date("...").
OB: An error message is thrown when trying to use a specific value in a table filter.
EB: The value new Date("3/2/2005") should be accepted in the table filter without throwing an error.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and include a dataset that has a datetime column.
2. Insert a table into the report.
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column.
4. Set the value1 of the filter to new Date("3/2/2005").
